page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: There are{very few houses}in our area more than{150 years old.}The houses range from{small cottages to large {farmhouses.}The{fronts}of the old houses are built from{whinstone from {nearby quarries}and the sides from {sandstone.}A{large proportion}of the houses are{council owned.}The most recent{council estate}is almost{15 {years old,}but in{Kingskettle}the new {council houses}are{less than a year {old.}Only a{small proportion}of the {council houses}have been bought {privately.}Although there are many {private houses}they are{interspersed thoughout the village, not in {organised estates.}The{majority}of them were built at the{turn of the {century.}A new estate of{12 to 15 {bungalows}is in the process of being built.{This is our only private {housing estate.
